name: Rake
description: A gaunt, pale humanoid with hollow eyes and razor-sharp claws. The Rake lurks in the darkness, paralyzing victims with fear before striking.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Gaze
abilities.description: Locks eyes with a target, stunning them with terror.

abilities.name: Nightmare Slash
abilities.description: A devastating attack that deals massive damage and causes bleeding.

abilities.name: Terror Incarnate
abilities.description: Attacks against feared targets deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Creeping Dread
abilities.description: Nearby enemies slowly accumulate fear stacks.
